special_text:
Whenever another noncreature source you control deals damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, put a loyalty counter on Rajabu. This ability triggers once each turn.
[+1]: Add {R}{R}. You can’t use this mana to cast permanent spells.
[-3]: Rajabu deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[-8]: Each opponent sacrifices five permanents. Rajabu deals 5 damage to each opponent.
